moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Role Play
moves.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

moves.name: Switcheroo
moves.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

moves.name: Flame Charge
moves.description: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: Mystical Fire
moves.description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

moves.name: Magic Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Mystical Fire
moves.description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.
